label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Vertical lozenge pattern of foliage, with floral inserts in each lozenge and floral rosettes at each angle of the lozenges. Printed in colors on mustard-yellow ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle, printed in brilliant colors on two joined sheets of paper. A coronation scene is taking place in a beautiful outdoor architectural setting.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: Horizontal rectangle, printed in brilliant colors on two joined sheets of paper. A coronation scene is taking place in a beautiful outdoor architectural setting.

label: Description
value: Drop-repeating design of tripod and bouquet of flowers, with foliage scrolls and addorsed birds. Printed in pink on blue ground. Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: Drop-repeating design of tripod and bouquet of flowers, with foliage scrolls and addorsed birds. Printed in pink on blue ground. Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper.

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Lozenge-shaped framework composed of blue lines running between solid lozenges, and flanked by foliage swags. Enclosed by this framework are alternating rose and tulip sprays.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Venus admonishing a putto, against a background of granary.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Kneeling female figure before a cage formed by trellis-work, in which a cupid is imprisoned. Pasted on a blue-colored support.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Figure of a cupid running toward the left, in a setting of greenery.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Lone figure of a putto blowing two horns. Printed in shades of orange on a mustard-yellow field,

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Simulated architectural frieze ornamented by a motif showing a woman attended by putti, and a basket of flowers with green leaves; against a gray field.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Green field, sewn with crossed lines of darker olive-green; brown border top and bottom, with dark green band of foliage sprinkled with pink flowers. Two figure motifs in center of paper, with third motif displaying a cat. Mounted on masonite panel.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Paper printed with intersecting ellipses in brown on neutral yellow. Border, across top, has leaf forms in brown and black on neutral yellow, and is edged with alternating hollow and solid black squares on brown field. Vertical rectangle.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle, double-panel width. Two alternating motifs: one depicting man in Oriental costume holding aloft a writing tablet, with flying bird above him. The other shows two men in Oriental costume cooking a bird in a pot over a fire. Motifs are surrounded by foliate branches and floral sprays. Printed on blue-gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle of paper suitable for a dado. Gray field with architectural moldings in blue-gray, shaded in black and highlighted in white. Motif in center of paper displays figures of a woman and a child, with shrubbery.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Repeating design of floral arabesques and scrolls, with pink and white roses, and fuchsias in a vase. Printed on a green ground. Vertical rectangle.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Square of paper showing two motifs of a large-scale geometric pattern. One motif in orange, circular, with repeating blue-black cone shapes, a white design at center and blue-black radial surround. The other motif diamond-shaped.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Figures of a cow and a milkmaid, on blue field.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle, with portion of a lyre, ribbons and volutes, printed in cane color, with shading in warm red-orange and highlights in white.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper. Gray field, with repeating dot-and-stroke motif in darker gray, and marbleized gray pilasters at either side. In the center, repeating vertically, are pictorial motifs: dove in a nest, seated woman with flower basket, musical instruments, man with a lute, and again the doves in a nest.

label: Physical description
value: Block-printed on joined sheets of handmade paper

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Square of paper, with rows of small clusters of roses and rosebuds. Ground speckled with white dotting. Printed in pink, green and white on pale brown ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Square of paper. Architectural construction suggestive of a temple of classical antiquity, with statue of Jupiter in the center.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Square portion of frieze, composed of festooned rust-colored drapery, with pearls, and lace-trimmed edges, against a green satin background. Across the bottom a black border, relieved by vertical white lozenges. This would form the bottom border for a drapery wallcovering.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle of joined sheets of paper. Large basket of flowers with dove flying out from its midst; another dove above, to right. Along each margin, slender shaft with occasional foliation, intercepted by small urn of flowers. Scrolls and swags of foliage and drapery, and crossed arrow and torch above large basket; diagonal yellow dotting on field.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Repeating design of bunch of pink roses and baskets of apples, with intertwining vine of pink jasmine, on green field.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Female figure, suggestive of sculpture, in costume of classical antiquity, standing on a pedestal with guilloche decoration. Printed in grays and neutral yellow on gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Male figure, suggestive of sculpture, in the costume of classical antiquity, with the attributes of a Bacchante: grapes in one hand, and goblet in the other. He stands on a pedestal with guilloche decoration. Printed in grays and neutral yellow on gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal portion of frieze printed on four joined sheets of paper, giving two units of a repeating design. Upon the center of a simulated scroll, partly unrolled, is an artisan cupid making arrows, in brown. Between the scrolls a quiver loaded with arrows, and green olive branches are above and below. Along the top and the bottom are simulated architectural moldings in brown and green.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Large-scale pattern suggestive of brocade; framework composed of scrolled yellow ribbon, enclosing bouquet of flowers in red flock. Glossy red satin ground. Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper.

label: Physical description
value: Block-printed and flocked on satin ground

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: Large-scale pattern suggestive of brocade; framework composed of scrolled yellow ribbon, enclosing bouquet of flowers in red flock. Glossy red satin ground. Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle printed on joined sheets of paper. Blue field with floral medallions in yellow, surrounded by foliate scrolls. At top and bottom, border with foliate scrolls enclosing blue floral clusters. Irise or rainbow paper.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Two putti at an altar; the male putto with a torch, the female with a basket of flowers.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Two vertical rectangles of joined sheets of paper, with one similar and one identical unit of decoration. In the bottom half of each, a pink and green rose wreath, enclosing a diagonally set square in which is a lyre; a palmette at each corner, outside the wreath. In the upper half, a Pompeian framework composed of urns, hanging musical instruments and drapery swags, enclosing grisaille figure groups: a) woman with lyre, attended by putto; b) woman putting a wreath upon a bust of Voltaire, attended by a putto.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: Two vertical rectangles of joined sheets of paper, with one similar and one identical unit of decoration. In the bottom half of each, a pink and green rose wreath, enclosing a diagonally set square in which is a lyre; a palmette at each corner, outside the wreath. In the upper half, a Pompeian framework composed of urns, hanging musical instruments and drapery swags, enclosing grisaille figure groups: a) woman with lyre, attended by putto; b) woman putting a wreath upon a bust of Voltaire, attended by a putto.

label: Description
value: In center, horizontal rectangular medallion with two figures in grisaille; to right and left, semicircular radiating fluting. To right and left of these, circular pink medallions, each with a figure in grisaille. At either end, a termination in acanthus arabesques. Horizontal rectangle.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: In center, horizontal rectangular medallion with two figures in grisaille; to right and left, semicircular radiating fluting. To right and left of these, circular pink medallions, each with a figure in grisaille. At either end, a termination in acanthus arabesques. Horizontal rectangle.

label: Description
value: Diagonally repeating design of four elements, in a framework of foliage: a) horseman, with castles in background; b) drinkers; c) hunters; d) herdsmen, with sheep and cows. Coloring scheme high in key. Vertical rectangle.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Notes
value: Diagonally repeating design of four elements, in a framework of foliage: a) horseman, with castles in background; b) drinkers; c) hunters; d) herdsmen, with sheep and cows. Coloring scheme high in key. Vertical rectangle.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle of joined sheets of paper. Alternating medallions: one shows two dogs guarding the carcass of a deer hanging head downward from a tree on which hangs also a hunting horn; the other shows a tripod urn containing flowers, flanked by peacock feathers, below which is a nest with three young birds.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Alternating acanthus rosettes and wreaths joined by acanthus scrolls and palmette motifs, in red flock on yellow field, with underlying foliage motifs in pale yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Block-printed and flocked on handmade paper

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Simulation of elaborately carved wood frame, oval, brought to the rectangle by simulated surface of graining. Enclosed in the frame is a painted representation of macaws in a setting of tropical foliage with a waterfall in the background.

label: Physical description
value: Block printed and hand painted on a combed background

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Simulation of elaborately carved wood frame, oval, brought to the rectangle by simulated surface of graining. Enclosed in the frame is a painted representation of foliage with two small goldfinches and a nest containing eggs.

label: Physical description
value: Block-printed and hand painted on a combed background

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Simulation of elaborately carved wood frame, oval, brought to the rectangle by simulated surface of graining. Enclosed in the frame is a painted representation of foliage and a mocking bird.

value: Block-printed and hand painted on a combed background

value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Simulation of elaborately carved oval wood frame, brought to the rectangle by simulated surface of graining. Enclosed in the frame is a painted representation of foliage and two deer.

label: Physical description
value: Block printed and hand painted on a combed background

value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Two large circular medallions, outlined in lighter gray on gray field; each contains a wreath of roses and periwinkles. In the center of each is a conventionalized lotus rosette, in gray. Printed in colors on gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. Leaf motif across top, in yellow and red-orange. Below, peonies in pink and leaves in yellow and red-orange, on green ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
